001package net.tvburger.jdl.common.patterns;
002
003import java.lang.annotation.*;
004
005/**
006 * Marker for design pattern annotations.
007 * Acts as a top-level grouping.
008 */
009@Documented
010@Retention(RetentionPolicy.SOURCE)
011@Target(ElementType.ANNOTATION_TYPE)
012public @interface DesignPattern {
013
014    /**
015     * Represents high-level categories of software design patterns.
016     *
017     * <p>Each category groups patterns with similar purposes and responsibilities.
018     * These categories can help developers understand, organize, and communicate
019     * design decisions more effectively.
020     */
021    enum Category {
022
023        DOMAIN_LANGUAGE("Patterns that create a shared vocabulary and boundaries so requirements read like code and code reads like requirements.\n" +
024                "Covers entities, value objects, aggregates, domain services, and other domain-driven design concepts."),
025        STRUCTURAL("Organize objects into larger structures.\n" +
026                "Covers Composite, Decorator, Adapter, Bridge, Facade, Proxy, Flyweight, composition principle."),
027        OBJECT_GRAPH("Patterns that define how objects are created, located, wired, and assembled into working structures.\n" +
028                "Covers object construction, factories, dependency injection, and service lookup."),
029        EXTENSIBILITY("Patterns and architectural mechanisms that allow systems to be extended, customized, or configured without modifying existing code artifacts.\n" +
030                "Covers Plug-in/Microkernel (module) architecture, Service Provider Interface (SPI), and Module/Package boundaries."),
031        BEHAVIORAL("Patterns that define communication and control flow between objects, focusing on how responsibilities are distributed and interactions are structured.\n" +
032                "Covers Strategy, Template Method, Observer, Command, State, Iterator, Visitor, Mediator, Memento, Chain of Responsibility, Interpreter."),
033        HELPER_STRUCTURES("Lightweight idioms and helper patterns that provide convenience, readability, or reusability at the code level.\n" +
034                "Often language-specific rather than architectural.");
035
036        private final String explanation;
037
038        /**
039         * Constructs a Category with a detailed explanation.
040         *
041         * @param explanation a description of the category and the patterns it contains
042         */
043        Category(String explanation) {
044            this.explanation = explanation;
045        }
046
047        /**
048         * Returns the detailed explanation of this category.
049         *
050         * @return the explanation describing this category
051         */
052        public String getExplanation() {
053            return explanation;
054        }
055    }
056
057    Category value();
058
059}
